question: Check all the correct statements about coding exercises and solutions

options.answer: Solutions are located at the end of each notebook.
Solutions are hidden in an accordion style.
Solutions are styled in a yellow warning colour, so don't peek!
Solutions can be run directly from the cell once the accordion is opened.
If you don't see starter code for an exercise, probably the code cell is collapsed by mistake.
You can quickly collapse a code cell by clicking the selection bar to its left.
Once a code cell is collapsed, there is no way to ever see it again!
